Reference

Defining the options

Constructor for defining all options used by the simulation, parameter estimation and visualization

markRecaptureObject()

helper function for mark recapture object

Simulating data

Functions for simulating data according to the model.

simContin()

simulation function for mark-recovery setting

plotMsr()

plot initial situation

Working with real-world data

Functions for .

renameData()

rename recovery data with default column names

Parameter estimation

Functions for estimating the model parameters.

estKDE()

estimate raw density of recovered individuals

estS()

survival estimator

estM()

estimate migratory connectivity

estR()

recovery probability estimator

Visualization

Functions for visualizing data and parameter estimates.

plotRawRecoveries()

plot raw recoveries of real world data

plotAgeDistribution()

plot age distribution of raw recoveries of real world data

plotKDE()

plot kernel density estimate and true density for simulated data

plotS()

plot true and estimated survival function

plotGOFofLM()

plot goodness of fit for linear model used to estimate parameter functions

plotM()

plot true and estimated migratory connectivity

Example data sets

Functions for visualizing data and parameter estimates.

mro1D

simulated data for the continuous approach (1D)

mro2D

simulated data for the continuous approach (2D)

robinsInit

raw real-world data for robins

Functions not to use

Functions used by other functions, but not directly accessed by the user.

new_markRecaptureObject()

constructor for mark recapture object

breedingArea()

helper function for breeding area

new_breedingArea()

constructor for breeding area

winteringArea()

helper function for wintering area

new_winteringArea()

constructor for wintering area

estLM()

linear model of kernel density estimate

f_f()

density function for recovered individuals only

f_f_sub()

subdensity function for recovered individuals

f_nf_sub()

subdensity function for not seen individuals

p_nf()

overall probability to be not seen

par_grid()

creates grid with function values

recIndsFunc()

calculates number of recovered individuals from marked and recoveries data frame

Package description

File containing the package description.

CONSURE

CONSURE: Spatially continuous survival, use of space and recovery probability estimates
